thread.title: TripAdvisor ranks the best beaches in the world
thread.title_full: TripAdvisor ranks the best beaches in the world

author: usatoday.com
title: TripAdvisor ranks the best beaches in the world
text:
Facebook Twitter Google+ LinkedIn TripAdvisor names the world's best beaches for 2017 Fullscreen Post to Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed.
TripAdvisor has announced the winners of its 2017 Travelers' Choice awards for beaches. The rankings were determined based on reviews and ratings collected in a single year from TripAdvisor users worldwide. Siesta Beach in Siesta Key, Fla., is ranked the No. 1 beach in the U.S. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Least expensive month to go: September, when hotels are bookable on TripAdvisor for an average of $214 per night. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Ka'anapali Beach in Lahaina, Hawaii, is the No. 2 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Least expensive month to go: May, when hotels are bookable on TripAdvisor for an average of $376 per night. TripAdvisor Fullscreen St. Pete Beach in St. Pete Beach, Fla., is the No. 3 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Least expensive month to go: November, when hotels are bookable on TripAdvisor for an average of $211 per night. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Clearwater Beach in Clearwater, Fla., is the No. 4 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Least expensive month to go: November, when hotels are bookable on TripAdvisor for an average of $186 per night. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Beach at Panama City in Panama City Beach, Fla., is the No. 5 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Least expensive month to go: January, when hotels are bookable on TripAdvisor for an average of $103 per night. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Hollywood Beach in Hollywood, Fla., is the No. 6 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Least expensive month to go: September, when hotels are bookable on TripAdvisor for an average of $172 per night. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Pensacola Beach in Pensacola Beach, Fla., is the No. 7 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Least expensive month to go: January, when hotels are bookable on TripAdvisor for an average of $140 per night. TripAdvisor Fullscreen St. Augustine Beach in St. Augustine Beach, Fla., is the No. 8 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Least expensive month to go: January, when hotels are bookable on TripAdvisor for an average of $138 per night. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Hanauma Bay Nature Preserve in Honolulu is the No. 9 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Least expensive month to go: April, when hotels are bookable on TripAdvisor for an average of $307 per night. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Ocean City Beach in Ocean City, Md., is the No. 10 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Least expensive month to go: November, when hotels are bookable on TripAdvisor for an average of $109 per night. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Fort Lauderdale Beach is the No. 11 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen South Beach in Miami Beach is the No. 12 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards. TripAdvisor Fullscreen Wai'anapanapa State Park in Hana, Hawaii, is the No. 13 beach in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor's 2017 Travelers' Choice awards.
